Class AbstractCollectionRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.AbstractCollectionRegistrar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlobCollectionRegistrar, SystemLogCollectionRegistrar, SystemMonitorCollectionRegistrar

    public abstract class AbstractCollectionRegistrar
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for collection registrar with common methods to create system's collections
